correlationKey.description: the correlation key of the message

messageId.description: the unique ID of the message; can be omitted. only useful to ensure only one message with the given ID will ever be published (during its lifetime)

timeToLive.description: how long the message should be buffered on the broker, in milliseconds

variables.description: the message variables as a JSON document; to be valid, the root of the document must be an object, e.g. { "a": "foo" }. [ "foo" ] would not be valid.
